pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared ActivityData = let
  Source = Lakehouse.Contents([]),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[workspaceId = "fb8c5c0a-2620-4db1-9e75-976ad2f69b69"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 2" = #"Navigation 1"{[lakehouseId = "57295ad7-476c-4050-80d4-def33926306d"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 3" = #"Navigation 2"{[Id = "Files", ItemKind = "Folder"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 4" = #"Navigation 3"{[Name = "ActivityData"]}[Content],
  #"Expanded Attributes" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Navigation 4", "Attributes", {"Content Type", "Kind", "Size", "Group", "Owner", "Permissions"}, {"Content Type", "Kind", "Size", "Group", "Owner", "Permissions"}),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Expanded Attributes", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  #"Invoke custom function" = Table.AddColumn(#"Filtered hidden files", "Transform file", each #"Transform file"([Content])),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Invoke custom function", {"Transform file"}),
  #"Expanded Transform file" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Removed other columns", "Transform file", {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT", "LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY", "RECDATA"}, {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT", "LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY", "RECDATA"}),
  #"Expanded RECDATA" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded Transform file", "RECDATA", {"ActivityID", "ActivityName", "ActivityParentID", "RecAreaActivityDescription", "RecAreaActivityFeeDescription", "RecAreaID"}, {"ActivityID", "ActivityName", "ActivityParentID", "RecAreaActivityDescription", "RecAreaActivityFeeDescription", "RecAreaID"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Expanded RECDATA", {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT", "LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY", "ActivityParentID", "RecAreaActivityDescription", "RecAreaActivityFeeDescription"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"ActivityID", type text}, {"ActivityName", type text}, {"RecAreaID", type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Changed column type", each ([RecAreaID] <> null))
in
  #"Filtered rows";
shared #"Sample file" = let
  Source = Lakehouse.Contents([]),
  #"Navigation 1" = Source{[workspaceId = "fb8c5c0a-2620-4db1-9e75-976ad2f69b69"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 2" = #"Navigation 1"{[lakehouseId = "57295ad7-476c-4050-80d4-def33926306d"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 3" = #"Navigation 2"{[Id = "Files", ItemKind = "Folder"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 4" = #"Navigation 3"{[Name = "ActivityData"]}[Content],
  #"Expanded Attributes" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Navigation 4", "Attributes", {"Content Type", "Kind", "Size", "Group", "Owner", "Permissions"}, {"Content Type", "Kind", "Size", "Group", "Owner", "Permissions"}),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Expanded Attributes", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  Navigation = #"Filtered hidden files"{0}[Content]
in
  Navigation;
shared Parameter = let
  Parameter = #"Sample file" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type binary, BinaryIdentifier = #"Sample file"]
in
  Parameter;
shared #"Transform Sample file" = let
  Source = Json.Document(Parameter, 65001),
  #"Converted to table" = Table.FromRecords({Source}),
  #"Expanded METADATA" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to table", "METADATA", {"RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS"}, {"RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS"}),
  #"Expanded METADATA.RESULTS" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded METADATA", "RESULTS", {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT"}, {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT"}),
  #"Expanded METADATA.SEARCH_PARAMETERS" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded METADATA.RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS", {"LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY"}, {"LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY"}),
  #"Expanded RECDATA" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Expanded METADATA.SEARCH_PARAMETERS", "RECDATA")
in
  #"Expanded RECDATA";
[FunctionQueryBinding = "{""exemplarFormulaName"":""Transform Sample file""}"]
shared #"Transform file" = let
  #"Transform file" = (Parameter as binary) => let
  Source = Json.Document(Parameter, 65001),
  #"Converted to table" = Table.FromRecords({Source}),
  #"Expanded METADATA" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Converted to table", "METADATA", {"RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS"}, {"RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS"}),
  #"Expanded METADATA.RESULTS" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded METADATA", "RESULTS", {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT"}, {"CURRENT_COUNT", "TOTAL_COUNT"}),
  #"Expanded METADATA.SEARCH_PARAMETERS" = Table.ExpandRecordColumn(#"Expanded METADATA.RESULTS", "SEARCH_PARAMETERS", {"LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY"}, {"LIMIT", "OFFSET", "QUERY"}),
  #"Expanded RECDATA" = Table.ExpandListColumn(#"Expanded METADATA.SEARCH_PARAMETERS", "RECDATA")
in
  #"Expanded RECDATA"
in
  #"Transform file";
shared DefaultStaging = let
  DefaultStaging = Pipeline.DefaultModelStorage()
in
  DefaultStaging;
shared ActivityData_DataDestination = let
  Pattern = Lakehouse.Contents([CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  Navigation_1 = Pattern{[workspaceId = "fb8c5c0a-2620-4db1-9e75-976ad2f69b69"]}[Data],
  Navigation_2 = Navigation_1{[lakehouseId = "57295ad7-476c-4050-80d4-def33926306d"]}[Data],
  TableNavigation = Navigation_2{[Id = "Activity_Data", ItemKind = "Table"]}?[Data]?,
  Table = NavigationTable.CreateTableOnDemand(TableNavigation, #table(type table[ActivityID = nullable Text.Type, ActivityName = nullable Text.Type, RecAreaID = nullable Text.Type], {}), [DeleteWhenEmpty = true])
in
  Table;
[Staging = "DefaultStaging"]
shared ActivityData_WriteToDataDestination = let
  ActivityData_WriteToDataDestination = Pipeline.ExecuteAction(ValueAction.WithTransaction([Target = ActivityData_DataDestination], (txn) => {TableAction.DeleteRows(txn[Target]), () => TableAction.InsertRows(txn[Target], ActivityData_TransformForWriteToDataDestination), Action.DoNothing}))
in
  ActivityData_WriteToDataDestination;
shared ActivityData_TransformForWriteToDataDestination = let
    SourceTable = Table.SelectColumns(ActivityData, {"ActivityID", "ActivityName", "RecAreaID"})
in
    SourceTable;
